body_html:
FYI @alextp @allenlavoie @josh11b @agarwal-ashish

Could you elaborate a bit on what you're trying and why :)? An example would help.
(I'm guessing you're filing this feature request because of this exception)

We'd really like to understand your use case better before thinking about removing this restriction. Perhaps there is a more idiomatic alternative to structuring your examples that could be leveraged instead?

body:
FYI @alextp @allenlavoie @josh11b @agarwal-ashish 

Could you elaborate a bit on what you're trying and why :)? An example would help.
(I'm guessing you're filing this feature request because of [this exception](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/d7cffe9/tensorflow/contrib/eager/python/network.py#L301))

We'd really like to understand your use case better before thinking about removing this restriction. Perhaps there is a more idiomatic alternative to structuring your examples that could be leveraged instead?
